title: Technically
alt: "Technically that sentence started with 'well', so--" "Ooh, a rock with a fossil in it!"
transcript:
[White Hat talks to Cueball who looks at a flying insect.]
White Hat: Well, technically, food is a "drug", since it's a substance that alters how your body works, so yes, I'mâ€”
Cueball: Hey, look at that weird bug![Caption below the panel:]
My life improved when I realized I could just ignore any sentence that started with "technically."
